AT.name: Bravely Default™
AT.description: Das Leuchten des Kristalls verblasst von Stunde zu Stunde mehr. Das schwindende Licht weist auf eine nahende tiefe Finsternis hin. Etwas muss geschehen… In Bravely Default, einem einzigartigen und innovativen RPG nur für Nintendo 3DS-Systeme, reist du durch Luxendarc, um die Kristalle zu erwecken. Du begegnest geheimnisvollen Verbündeten und furchterregenden Feinden aus allen Ecken der Welt und musst deine Gegner in unkomplizierten, rundenbasierten Kämpfen besiegen. Die neuen Systeme "Brave and Default" und "Bravely Second" bieten noch mehr Raum für Strategie. So kannst du den Rhythmus traditioneller rundenbasierter Kämpfe unterbrechen, indem du in einem Zug mehrfach angreifst oder die Zeit anhältst.

AU.name: Bravely Default™
AU.description: The crystal’s glow wanes by the hour. Its fading light portends a greater darkness to come. Something must be done… In Bravely Default, quest through Luxendarc to awaken the crystals in a unique and innovative RPG experience, only on Nintendo 3DS family systems. Meet mysterious allies and terrible foes from all corners of the world, and best your enemies in instantly accessible turn-based battles. The new “Brave and Default” and “Bravely Second” systems set the stage for even more strategies, allowing you to disrupt the flow of traditional turn-based battles by attacking multiple times in a single turn – or even freezing time.

BG.name: Bravely Default™

BE.name: Bravely Default™
BE.description: La lueur du cristal s'évanouit progressivement. Sa lumière faiblissante laisse présager un grand malheur. Il faut agir… Dans Bravely Default, la quête à travers Luxendarc pour réveiller les cristaux est un RPG unique et innovant, en exclusivité sur les consoles de la famille Nintendo 3DS. Rencontrez de mystérieux alliés et de terribles ennemis des quatre coins du monde, et venez à bout de vos adversaires dans des batailles au tour par tour intuitives. Les nouveaux systèmes “Brave and Default” et “Bravely Second” introduisent de nouvelles stratégies vous permettant de bouleverser le flot traditionnel des batailles au tour par tour en attaquant à plusieurs reprises lors d'un même tour, ou encore en stoppant le temps en plein combat.

ES.name: Bravely Default™
ES.description: El brillo del cristal se va extinguiendo a medida que pasan las horas. Su luz, cada vez más tenue, es un presagio de la gran oscuridad que está por venir. Ha llegado el momento de actuar… En Bravely Default, viajarás por Luxendarc en una misión para despertar a los cristales viviendo una experiencia RPG única e innovadora, solo para la familia de consolas Nintendo 3DS. Te encontrarás con misteriosos aliados y temibles enemigos de todos los rincones del mundo; a estos últimos deberás derrotarlos en combates instantáneos por turnos. Los nuevos sistemas Brave and Default y Bravely Second dan lugar a nuevas estrategias, permitiéndote interrumpir el tradicional discurrir de los combates por turnos con ataques múltiples, o incluso detener el tiempo.

IT.name: Bravely Default™
IT.description: La luce del cristallo si indebolisce a vista d'occhio. Il suo lento spegnersi fa presagire l'arrivo di una terribile oscurità. Bisogna fare qualcosa... In Bravely Default, dovrai avventurarti in Luxendarc per risvegliare i cristalli, per un'esperienza RPG senza precedenti, in esclusiva sulle console della famiglia Nintendo 3DS. Incontra misteriosi alleati e terribili nemici da tutti gli angoli del mondo e sconfiggi gli avversari in incredibili combattimenti a turni. I nuovi sistemi di lotta "Brave e Default" e "Bravely Second" apriranno le porte a nuove strategie, permettendoti di fermare il flusso delle lotte a turni tradizionali con attacchi multipli in un solo turno, o addirittura congelando il tempo.

NL.name: Bravely Default™
NL.description: Het licht van het kristal verstomt met elk verstreken uur. Het dovende licht is de voorbode van een grotere, komende duisternis. Er moet iets gedaan worden. In Bravely Default trek je door Luxendarc om de kristallen te doen ontwaken in een unieke en innovatieve RPG, alleen op Nintendo 3DS-systemen. Ontmoet mysterieuze bondgenoten en verschrikkelijke vijanden in alle uithoeken van de wereld en krijg de overhand op je tegenstanders in toegankelijke, in beurten opgedeelde gevechten. De nieuwe "Brave and Default"- en "Bravely Second"-systemen maken meer strategieën mogelijk, waardoor je het verloop van de traditionele beurten kunt verstoren en meerdere keren kunt aanvallen in een beurt of de tijd kunt stopzetten.

NZ.name: Bravely Default™
NZ.description: The crystal’s glow wanes by the hour. Its fading light portends a greater darkness to come. Something must be done… In Bravely Default, quest through Luxendarc to awaken the crystals in a unique and innovative RPG experience, only on Nintendo 3DS family systems. Meet mysterious allies and terrible foes from all corners of the world, and best your enemies in instantly accessible turn-based battles. The new “Brave and Default” and “Bravely Second” systems set the stage for even more strategies, allowing you to disrupt the flow of traditional turn-based battles by attacking multiple times in a single turn – or even freezing time.

PL.name: Bravely Default™
PL.description: The crystal’s glow wanes by the hour. Its fading light portends a greater darkness to come. Something must be done… In Bravely Default, quest through Luxendarc to awaken the crystals in a unique and innovative RPG experience, only on Nintendo 3DS family systems. Meet mysterious allies and terrible foes from all corners of the world, and best your enemies in instantly accessible turn-based battles. The new “Brave and Default” and “Bravely Second” systems set the stage for even more strategies, allowing you to disrupt the flow of traditional turn-based battles by attacking multiple times in a single turn – or even freezing time.

PT.name: Bravely Default™
PT.description: O brilho do cristal vai desaparecendo aos poucos. A sua luz que desvanece pressagia um grande período de trevas e algo tem de ser feito… Em Bravely Default aventuras-te por Luxendarc para despertares os cristais num inovador RPG disponível apenas para as consolas da família Nintendo 3DS. Conhece aliados misteriosos e inimigos malévolos dos quatro cantos do mundo e tenta derrotar os teus inimigos em batalhas por turnos imediatamente acessíveis. Os novos sistemas “Brave and Default” e “Bravely Second" dão o mote para ainda mais estratégias, já que permitem quebrar o fluxo das batalhas por turnos tradicionais atacando várias vezes num único turno (ou até congelando o tempo!)

RU.name: Bravely Default™
RU.description: Эта игра доступна только на английском, французском, итальянском, немецком и испанском языках. Сияние кристалла слабеет с каждым часом, предвещая наступление великого мрака. Нужно действовать, чтобы остановить катастрофу… В Bravely Default, уникальной и инновационной игре жанра RPG, доступной только на системах линейки Nintendo 3DS, вы отправитесь в опасное приключение, чтобы пробудить кристаллы и спасти Luxendarc. Повстречайте загадочных союзников и опаснейших врагов со всех уголков мира, одержите верх над противниками в пошаговых битвах. Новые системы «Brave and Default» и «Bravely Second» добавят пространства для маневра, позволяя нарушать привычный ход пошаговых битв, нанося несколько ударов за один ход или даже замораживая время.
